content: I don't have personal opinions or feelings, but one of the most famous and stunning artworks from the byzantine empire is the hagia sophia in present-day istanbul, turkey. the hagia sophia was originally built as a christian church in the 6th century and later converted into a mosque during the ottoman empire. today the hagia sophia is a museum and it is widely considered one of the world's greatest architectural marvels. its breathtaking byzantine mosaics and soaring dome continue to inspire awe and wonder in visitors from around the world.
